Name: Glutton Cape
LongDescription: Boosts maximum HP. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Munchlax and Snorlax.  You can get a Glutton Cape at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Munch-Drool, a Munch-Claw, and a Tummy Charm. That's the easy way! An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
